oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from John A. Crutchfield to L. M. Crutchfield
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from John A. Crutchfield to L. M. Crutchfield. Crutchfield states that his unit has "orders to be ready to march at a minutes warning." He also mentions that "it is reported that the Yankees are coming from Memphis." The letter was written in a camp near Tupelo, Mississippi.
